chara.textHome:
You had better...keep your distance from me.
If people think you're involved with
Kanae Yukino...it'll be bad news for you...

Get in too deep, one fight will
lead to another...
and get worse day after day...

And suddenly...
you'll be caught up in big trouble.

Before music becomes your only oasis
in the world...get away, far away.

I'd given up on being a vocalist...
I...don't even speak much...

But, when I sing...and the words come
from deep in my heart...
It feels nice...very nice...

I feel lighter...swifter than before...
I get the feeling I can crush the enemy...

Nothing scares me... I have...
the strength to survive on my own...

Since I finally have this power...
I'll be using it for myself...

One way...will be to repay those who've
helped me, even at the cost of my life...
But that's a secret.

Once I'm strong enough to never lose...
I'll be able to carry on alone...
That's what I thought, but I was wrong...

Only with Mifuyu...Yachiyo...
and Yachiyo's grandma around...

was I able to break out of my shell and
become strong...
But that's a secret.
You shouldn't come here anymore...
Well, no... You can come...

But just not to where I am...
It's too dangerous...

Three hours of sleep again today...
I'm not sleepy... I've never felt sleepy...
That's normal for me...
Maybe I just don't need much?

I like it on the roof, where no one
enters my field of vision.
It's like a world where only I exist...
So even now, I'd rather be alone...
Uh, never mind.
Hm? Sorry... I was listening to music...
Blues is the best, around this time... Yeah...
I don't sleep much... You head on to bed...

I'm going to practice a few guitar cords...
and hunt down a few music vids... Yeah...

I like being alone...
Time doesn't really matter...

But after meeting Yachiyo,
I don't like it as much...
Heh... Saying that's kinda...embarrassing.

Hm... I should go...
Even those criminals I've seen...
They might be under that Witch's curse...

Hypothetically speaking... I would be...
concerned if it came down to fighting
lots of Magical Girls...

I'm used to fighting, so it's difficult
for me to pull punches...

Against imitations, though...
That's another story...

Ever since I was a little kid,
I've always been in fights...
I don't go around picking them...

It's all because of my face.
Fights come to me...
Gah! Who's there?!

Ah, sorry... I get really on edge
when people come up behind me...

I've been attacked from behind before,
so I can't help it.
My favorite music genre? I'm not picky...

I like anything with bite, anything I can feel...
People say I look like I listen to
punk or metal, but...it doesn't matter.
Mm... Tea and tangerines are good...
Though, I only recently discovered them...
They help me relax.

If the time and place had been different...
I might've wished to change how I look...

But...I saved my friend's life,
so...I don't regret it.

I think Mifuyu wants to be a normal girl.
She loves manga, TV dramas,
and romantic stories...

Her eyes look so envious
when she watches them.

It's all thanks to Yachiyo's grandmother that
I've softened up as much as I have...

It's strange...almost like she gave water...
to a part of me that had withered away...

Looking back...
I have so many debts to repay...

Starting with the first time
I was saved...up until now.
Yachiyo, I have to pay her back...
The conversation has gone on long enough...

Unless you...for some reason...
want to be my friend?
Wait... Are you serious?
Yeah... Just crush them all...
I've been in lots of fights, so...

It's so reassuring to have someone
you can trust at your back.
Can I think of this as...teamwork?

I'm grateful to have everyone
fighting by my side now...

Kanae Yukino... If you're thinking
I'm a known delinquent...that's fine...

I wasn't planning on...
making friends either way...

I wasn't planning on...
making friends either way...

This might sound conceited...
but...I'm stronger.

I don't...have that much to say,
but...will you...listen?

Someday, I'd like to sing...
with my friends, live in concert...
I don't know...if it'll ever happen though...

I'm drawn to songs that vent emotions...
Yachiyo said it could mean
I'm holding in a lot.
She could be right...
